properties (Access = public) SystemType = "BTNIRS"; % Instrument type Device; % Control class for system UpdateTime=500; % ms to update display handles; % struct to hold handles to app controls Subject % Holds data Folders % default folder locations Drawing % holds the drawing handles MainTimer % holds drawing and data collection timer; Realtime % Description end
% Callbacks that handle component events methods (Access = private)
% Code that executes after component creation function startupFcn(app, systemType, datafolder)
if(nargin<2) systemType=[]; end if(nargin>2 && ~isempty(datafolder)) if(ismac | isunix) datafolder = ['/Users/' getenv('USER') '/Desktop/' datafolder]; else datafolder = [getenv('UserProfile') '\Desktop\' datafolder]; end else datafolder=[]; end
set(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure,'WindowState','minimized'); set(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure,'visible','off');
% make sure the matlab path is ok folder=fileparts(which('BrainRecordIR.mlapp')); if(~contains(path,fullfile(folder,'src'))) disp('Adding BrainRecordIR files to path'); path(path,genpath(folder)); end s = SplashScreen( 'TechEn', 'splash.png'); initializeApp(app,systemType, datafolder); pause(1); set(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure,'WindowState','maximized'); set(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure,'visible','on'); delete(s);
if(app.Device.isconnected) set(app.NotConnectedLamp,'Color','g'); set(app.NotConnectedLampLabel,'Text',app.Device.info); else set(app.NotConnectedLamp,'Color',[0.902 0.902 0.902]); set(app.NotConnectedLampLabel,'Text','Not Connected'); end set(app.Battery100Label,'Text',['Battery=' num2str(app.Device.battery) '%']);
end
% Menu selected function: RegisterNewSubjectMenu function RegisterNewSubjectMenuSelected(app, event) RegisterSubject; end
% Menu selected function: AboutMenu function AboutMenuSelected(app, event) %display the message box about the software msgbox({'Brain RecordIR Software',... 'Ted Huppert','University of Pittsburgh','Copyright 2018'},... 'About');
end
% Button pushed function: StartButton function StartButtonPushed(app, event) StartDAQ(); end
% Value changed function: SwitchSourcesOnOff function SwitchSourcesOnOffValueChanged(app, event) LasersAllOnOff;
end
% Value changed function: SelectDisplayType function SelectDisplayTypeValueChanged(app, event) SelectWhichData;
end
% Menu selected function: LoadSavedDataMenu function LoadSavedDataMenuSelected(app, event) LoadPrevious; end
% Menu selected function: ExitMenu function ExitMenuSelected(app, event) ShutdownNIRS; delete(app); end
% Menu selected function: PreferencesMenu function PreferencesMenuSelected(app, event)
end
% Menu selected function: QuickSetupMenu function QuickSetupMenuSelected(app, event)
end
% Menu selected function: ShowQualityMenu function ShowQualityMenuSelected(app, event)
end
% Menu selected function: HelpDocumentionMenu function HelpDocumentionMenuSelected(app, event)
end
% Button pushed function: MarkEventButton, MarkEventButton_2 function MarkEventButton_2Pushed(app, event) AddStimEvent; end
% Value changed function: Switch_33 function Switch_33ValueChanged(app, event) EventToggle;
end
% Value changed function: TaskDropDown function TaskDropDownValueChanged(app, event)
end
% Button pushed function: AddCommentButton function AddCommentButtonPushed(app, event) AddStimComment; end
% Button pushed function: AutoAdjustButton function AutoAdjustButtonPushed(app, event) LaserAutoAdjust; end
% Button pushed function: AutoGainButton function AutoGainButtonPushed(app, event) DetAutoAdjust; end
% Button pushed function: ShowNoiseMapButton function ShowNoiseMapButtonPushed(app, event) ShowSNRDetectors; end
% Value changed function: HighPassEditField function HighPassEditFieldValueChanged(app, event) BPFchanged;
end
% Value changed function: CheckBox function CheckBoxValueChanged(app, event) BPFchanged;
end
% Value changed function: LowPassEditField function LowPassEditFieldValueChanged(app, event) BPFchanged;
end
% Value changed function: CheckBox_2 function CheckBox_2ValueChanged(app, event) BPFchanged;
end
% Value changed function: ApplyMotionCorrectionCheckBox function ApplyMotionCorrectionCheckBoxValueChanged(app, event) MOCOchanged;
end
% Value changed function: ApplyGLMCheckBox function ApplyGLMCheckBoxValueChanged(app, event) GLMchanged;
end
% Button pushed function: RunAnalysisButton function RunAnalysisButtonPushed(app, event) PostAnalysis; end
% Value changed function: DrawMode4Probe function DrawMode4ProbeValueChanged(app, event) ChangeProbeView;
end
% Value changed function: LinkWavelengthsCheckBox function LinkWavelengthsCheckBoxValueChanged(app, event)
end
% Close request function: BrainRecordIRUIFigure function BrainRecordIRUIFigureCloseRequest(app, event) ShutdownNIRS; delete(app)
end
% Value changed function: DrawMode4StatsView function DrawMode4StatsViewValueChanged(app, event) ChangeProbeViewStats;
end
% Value changed function: ListBoxWhichContrast function ListBoxWhichContrastValueChanged(app, event) ChangeProbeViewStats;
end
% Value changed function: ThreshholdEditField function ThreshholdEditFieldValueChanged(app, event) ChangeProbeViewStats;
end
% Value changed function: DropDownStatsPorQ function DropDownStatsPorQValueChanged(app, event) ChangeProbeViewStats;
end
% Value changed function: DViewDropDownStats3DViewAngle function DViewDropDownStats3DViewAngleValueChanged(app, event) ChangeProbeViewStats;
end
% Value changed function: ApplyHardwarefiltersCheckBox function ApplyHardwarefiltersCheckBoxValueChanged(app, event) HardWareFiltersChanged;
end
% Value changed function: SampleRateDropDown function SampleRateDropDownValueChanged(app, event) SampleRateChanged(str2num(event.Value(1:end-2)));
end
% Value changed function: SetAllGainEditField function SetAllGainEditFieldValueChanged(app, event) value = app.SetAllGainEditField.Value; SetAllDetGains(value); end
% Value changed function: SetAllPowersEditField function SetAllPowersEditFieldValueChanged(app, event) value = app.SetAllPowersEditField.Value; SetAllLaserPwr(value); end end
% Component initialization methods (Access = private)
% Create UIFigure and components function createComponents(app)
% Create BrainRecordIRUIFigure and hide until all components are created app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure = uifigure('Visible', 'off'); app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure.Position = [100 100 1123 675]; app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure.Name = 'Brain RecordIR'; app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure.CloseRequestFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @BrainRecordIRUIFigureCloseRequest, true);
% Create FileMenu app.FileMenu = uimenu(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure); app.FileMenu.Text = 'File';
% Create RegisterNewSubjectMenu app.RegisterNewSubjectMenu = uimenu(app.FileMenu); app.RegisterNewSubjectMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @RegisterNewSubjectMenuSelected, true); app.RegisterNewSubjectMenu.Text = 'Register New Subject';
% Create LoadSavedDataMenu app.LoadSavedDataMenu = uimenu(app.FileMenu); app.LoadSavedDataMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @LoadSavedDataMenuSelected, true); app.LoadSavedDataMenu.Text = 'Load Saved Data';
% Create PreferencesMenu app.PreferencesMenu = uimenu(app.FileMenu); app.PreferencesMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @PreferencesMenuSelected, true); app.PreferencesMenu.Text = 'Preferences';
% Create ExitMenu app.ExitMenu = uimenu(app.FileMenu); app.ExitMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @ExitMenuSelected, true); app.ExitMenu.Text = 'Exit';
% Create DataQualityMenu app.DataQualityMenu = uimenu(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure); app.DataQualityMenu.Text = 'Data Quality';
% Create ShowQualityMenu app.ShowQualityMenu = uimenu(app.DataQualityMenu); app.ShowQualityMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @ShowQualityMenuSelected, true); app.ShowQualityMenu.Text = 'Show Quality';
% Create QuickSetupMenu app.QuickSetupMenu = uimenu(app.DataQualityMenu); app.QuickSetupMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @QuickSetupMenuSelected, true); app.QuickSetupMenu.Text = 'Quick Setup';
% Create RegisterProbe app.RegisterProbe = uimenu(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure); app.RegisterProbe.Text = 'Register Probe';
% Create LaunchPheobeMenu app.LaunchPheobeMenu = uimenu(app.RegisterProbe); app.LaunchPheobeMenu.Text = 'Launch Pheobe';
% Create HelpMenu app.HelpMenu = uimenu(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure); app.HelpMenu.Text = 'Help';
% Create AboutMenu app.AboutMenu = uimenu(app.HelpMenu); app.AboutMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @AboutMenuSelected, true); app.AboutMenu.Text = 'About';
% Create HelpDocumentionMenu app.HelpDocumentionMenu = uimenu(app.HelpMenu); app.HelpDocumentionMenu.MenuSelectedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @HelpDocumentionMenuSelected, true); app.HelpDocumentionMenu.Text = 'Help Documention';
% Create TabViewGrou app.TabViewGrou = uitabgroup(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure); app.TabViewGrou.Position = [9 15 710 646];
% Create ResearchViewTab app.ResearchViewTab = uitab(app.TabViewGrou); app.ResearchViewTab.Title = 'Research View';
% Create MainPlotWindow app.MainPlotWindow = uiaxes(app.ResearchViewTab); xlabel(app.MainPlotWindow, 'Time') app.MainPlotWindow.PlotBoxAspectRatio = [1.52941176470588 1 1]; app.MainPlotWindow.Box = 'on'; app.MainPlotWindow.YGrid = 'on'; app.MainPlotWindow.Position = [11 123 678 451];
% Create Label app.Label = uilabel(app.ResearchViewTab); app.Label.HorizontalAlignment = 'right'; app.Label.FontWeight = 'bold'; app.Label.Position = [31 137 25 22]; app.Label.Text = '';
% Create SelectDisplayType app.SelectDisplayType = uidropdown(app.ResearchViewTab); app.SelectDisplayType.Items = {'Raw 690nm', 'Raw 830nm', '\deltaOD 690nm', '\deltaOD 830nm', 'HbO_2', 'HbR'}; app.SelectDisplayType.ValueChangedFcn = createCallbackFcn(app, @SelectDisplayTypeValueChanged, true); app.SelectDisplayType.FontWeight = 'bold'; app.SelectDisplayType.Position = [35 66 207 22]; app.SelectDisplayType.Value = 'Raw 690nm';
% Create AquistionControlsPanel app.AquistionControlsPanel = uipanel(app.ResearchViewTab); app.AquistionControlsPanel.Title = 'Aquistion Controls'; app.AquistionControlsPanel.FontWeight = 'bold'; app.AquistionControlsPanel.Position = [294 6 384 86];

% App creation and deletion methods (Access = public)
% Construct app function app = BrainRecordIR(varargin)
% Create UIFigure and components createComponents(app)
% Register the app with App Designer registerApp(app, app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure)
% Execute the startup function runStartupFcn(app, @(app)startupFcn(app, varargin{:}))
if nargout == 0 clear app end end
% Code that executes before app deletion function delete(app)
% Delete UIFigure when app is deleted delete(app.BrainRecordIRUIFigure) end end end
